name: Witch Princess Kingdom
description:
An Action Platform built around the idea of mixing spell components together to fight.

Controls are defaulted as:

1, 2, 3, and 4, adding Fire, Water, Earth, and Air respectively.

A,D for left and right movement.

Space for jump.

Left Mouse button to cast spells.

Music

Komiku - Mushrooms

Komiku - The adventure

Komiku - Ending

Monplaisir - Level_2

Monplaisir - Victory

Monplaisir - Defeat
